name: HR & Onboarding Copilot
tagline: Guides new employees and managers through HR processes seamlessly
overview: The HR & Onboarding Copilot helps new employees navigate their first weeks at Cummins and supports managers through the onboarding process. It provides personalized guidance, answers HR questions, tracks task completion, and ensures nothing falls through the cracks.
whatItDoes: Guides new hires through onboarding tasks and milestones
Answers HR policy and benefits questions instantly
Tracks completion of required training and paperwork
Connects new employees with relevant resources and people
prompts: What do I need to complete in my first week?
How do I set up my 401k contributions?
What's the process for requesting office equipment?
When does my health insurance coverage start?
Who should I contact about access badge issues?

impact.description: New hires productive sooner with better support
Fewer routine questions reaching HR team

guardrails: Sensitive HR topics (compensation, performance) escalate to humans
Does not access personal employee data beyond approved scope
Benefits guidance includes 'confirm with HR' recommendations
Legal and compliance questions route to appropriate teams
All guidance based on current, approved HR materials
